containerVersion.name: JY Insights Gold Plus Enhanced v2.0
containerVersion.description: Enhanced GA4 tracking with 50+ new parameters including RFM metrics, product handles, category data, complete user profiles, order metadata, and multi-currency support. Includes 14 GA4 tags, 4 Google Ads tags, 7 Meta Pixel tags. Supports revenue attribution by source, customer segmentation, product journey analysis, and 90%+ Enhanced Conversions match rate.

parameter.value:
<script>
fbq('track', 'ViewContent', {
  content_ids: [{{CJS - First Product ID}}],
  content_type: 'product',
  value: {{DLV - ecommerce.value}},
  currency: '{{DLV - ecommerce.currency}}'
});
</script>

<script>
fbq('track', 'AddToCart', {
  content_ids: {{CJS - Product IDs Array}},
  content_type: 'product',
  value: {{DLV - ecommerce.value}},
  currency: '{{DLV - ecommerce.currency}}'
});
</script>

<script>
fbq('track', 'InitiateCheckout', {
  content_ids: {{CJS - Product IDs Array}},
  content_type: 'product',
  value: {{DLV - ecommerce.value}},
  currency: '{{DLV - ecommerce.currency}}',
  num_items: {{CJS - Total Items Count}}
});
</script>

<script>
fbq('track', 'AddPaymentInfo', {
  content_ids: {{CJS - Product IDs Array}},
  content_type: 'product',
  value: {{DLV - ecommerce.value}},
  currency: '{{DLV - ecommerce.currency}}'
});
</script>

<script>
fbq('track', 'Purchase', {
  content_ids: {{CJS - Product IDs Array}},
  content_type: 'product',
  value: {{DLV - ecommerce.value}},
  currency: '{{DLV - ecommerce.currency}}',
  num_items: {{CJS - Total Items Count}}
}, {
  eventID: '{{CJS - Event ID Generator}}'
});
</script>

variable.name: Const - Google Ads Conversion Label - Purchase
